explains: adj. 爱说话的，健谈的；交际的，沟通的
wordGroup: communicative function 交际功能，交际职能

sentences.en: I don't find him very communicative.
She has become a lot more tolerant and communicative.
sentences.cn: 她变成了一个更宽容，更健谈的人。

sentences.en: We have a very communicative approach to teaching languages.
sentences.cn: 我们有一个交际能力很强的方法来教授语言。
